Articles.Content:
Hello, first of all, i didnt know where to post this

and for my main question is, has anyone made a tank like the ones in kerbals at war??

i also dont know where to get hstwtruck
i am not sure about it but it might be out there

Ya mean like this?

This was the Robug Labs Tank for the hell of it.
yeh basiclly, is there instructions on to make it or download for it?
This is from 0.16, I can try to rebuild it, But I can say it was VERY hard to control because of its weight.
oh. can i ask a question, i downloaded a superb fortress plane from youtube i found but its in v .15 and im using .17 and cant use it, why?
Cant use .craft files from different versions unfortunately.
Not even if you edit the version number in the file Sbowyer28?

how do you do that?

on kerbals at war there was a vtol plane, i was going to post asking if anyone knows how to make it but i dont know where to post it, has anyone ev er made it?

Edited October 6, 2012 by cdrapala
didnt want to double post
I don't know about that vtol plane, but with the old .craft files, you can open them with notepad
hmmm that vtol plane did look good, and the tanks and boats, im currently working on boats now, they are going alright until i fire the missiles.

Cant use .craft files from different versions unfortunately.

Yes you can!

here is my thread,if you want to know how:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/22339-how-to-make-a-craft-compatible-with-the-version-you-want!(ex-a-0-16-craft-on-0-17)?highlight=compatible
I have a land/sea stock mobile artillery, so it has many rockets.

Yes you can!

here is my thread,if you want to know how:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/22339-how-to-make-a-craft-compatible-with-the-version-you-want!(ex-a-0-16-craft-on-0-17)?highlight=compatible

Hmm, Didn't know that but my tank .craft file was lost when I reset my laptop :/
bomber can you upload it or pictures?
VTOL planes can be made pretty easily with Damned Robotics.

It's not quite finished, but I've been working on an armored rover. Meet the Brahms. It's bigger brother, the Patchy, is going to be armed and ready for high-speed combat. I'm still leaving the challenge of making my tanks all stock.

Can someone tell me how to do spoilers on this new forum? I want to make a thread on my line of armored rovers, but I don't want it to be filled with big pictures.
not bad, im still looking for hstw truck

not bad, im still looking for hstw truck

hstwtruck is part of the carts pack: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/7854-PLUGIN-PART-0-16-Carts-v1-34-Cruise-Control-Compatibility-and-More?highlight=cart

Also far as making an offroad capable tank that can actually climb things like a tank does, you could use these : http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/21909-0-16-TouhouTorpedo-s-Modular-Multiwheels-%28Tosh-s-Cart-Mod-powered%29 like they are shown in this video at 0:20 :

so no one has made that vtol?

or the heli, maybe the tanks and boat... they are all good, i have got a boat, and thats it

A side-venture from the Brahms project I posted earlier resulted in the Gillean C-HAV. I was trying weapon designs to eventually put on the big 'ol Patchy. I tried guns, missles, crushing arms, and flamethrowers. I ended up with a vehicle sporting a weapon I can't begin to describe.... This thing actually works!
